text: Judit Reigl (born Judit Némedy; 1 May 1923 – 7 August 2020) was a Hungarian painter. Her career was based in Paris. Her works are primarily found in the collections of French museums, including the Musée d'Art Moderne de la Ville de Paris, Musée National d'Art Moderne and Musée de Grenoble. Reigl died on 7 August 2020 at the age of 97.Meghalt Reigl Judit, az egyik legdrágább magyar művész ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian painters
title: Judit Reigl
